name: Glances
short_description: Real-time system monitoring for containers and host metrics.
description: Real-time system monitoring for containers and host metrics. Glances is a self-hosted application focused on monitoring, tools, dashboard, utility. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Glances on your home server to real-time system monitoring for containers and host metrics without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Glances to manage your monitoring workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
